text: logon mein aise bhee hai jo kahate hai ki "ham allaah par eemaan lae," kintu jab allaah ke maamale mein ve satae gae to unhonne logon kee or se aaee huee aazamaish ko allaah kee yaatana samajh liya. ab yadi tere rab kee or se sahaayata pahunch gaee to kahenge, "ham to tumhaare saath the." kya jo kuchh duniyaavaalon ke seenon mein hai use allaah bhalee-bhaanti nahin jaanata
